Who are we?

At CastHost we believe in paying full attention to our customers. We aim to create an ever-growing community where you can drop in at any time and ask for help or advice concerning your project. We do not wish to hide behind complicated and slow support systems which is why we have a Live Chat available 9AM – 7PM Eastern on top of our 24h ticket system.
For more information please visit our About Us Page.
CastHost Team



FAQ:

How do I Migrate my Website to CastHost?

You have three options to migrate your website to us:

  1. Simply copy paste the files from your old host via FTP to your computer, then re-upload the files to our servers. In the case of WordPress don’t forget to also Export/Import your database!
  2. You can create a full backup copy of your website in Cpanel (.tar file). You have to download this backup and send it to us. (Note: Since you don’t have SSH access to our web-hosting servers you can’t restore these on your own).
  3. If you have a WordPress website, then the easiest solution is to use a migration plugin. Install the migration plugin on your website and export your WordPress website to your computer. Install the same migration plugin to your fresh WordPress installation on our web servers and restore your WordPress website!

What are Nameservers and how do I Update them?

If you already have a Domain at another Domain registrar or host you have to update the Nameservers. You have to log in to your account at the Domain registrar where your Domain is and update your Domain Nameservers to ours!

You will receive information about our Nameservers in an E-mail once you purchased one of our Hosting plans.

If you buy your Domain from us you don’t have to do anything!


What are the CastHost Nameservers?

Our Nameservers for our Web-Hosting packages:

ns1.casthost.net

ns2.casthost.net
